spell.name: acid breath
spell.affectmessage: Acid is eating away at your skin!

spell.name: acidity
spell.affectmessage: Your skin bubbles and hisses as it dissolves!

spell.name: air walk
spell.affectmessage: You may walk on the air itself.

spell.name: alrons aria
spell.lyrics: The courage and strength with which Alron is blessed Will come to our aid 'til our souls are at rest!
spell.affectmessage: You feel confident Alron is guiding you.

spell.name: amnesia
spell.affectmessage: You seem to be forgetting something...

spell.name: animal kin
spell.affectmessage: You are feeling a strong bond with animals.

spell.name: anti-magic shell
spell.affectmessage: You are enveloped in an anti-magic shell.

spell.name: aria of armament
spell.lyrics: Of bravery I sing to thee, Take up your swords and follow me!
spell.affectmessage: You feel protected by song.

spell.name: aria of asylum
spell.lyrics: Through pouring rain and stinging sleet, As swords and arrows fall, We fear no pain in our retreat, Asylum saves us all!
spell.affectmessage: You are enveloped by a gossamer shield.

spell.name: armor
spell.affectmessage: You feel protected.

spell.name: attraction field
spell.affectmessage: You are much more attractive... to weapons.

spell.name: barkskin
spell.affectmessage: Your skin is thick and tough like tree bark.

spell.name: blackmantle
spell.affectmessage: You are covered by the blackmantle.

spell.name: bless
spell.affectmessage: You feel blessed.

spell.name: capacitance boost
spell.affectmessage: Your energy capacitance is boosted.

spell.name: chant of light
spell.lyrics: Oh sun, sweet kiss of warmth and light, Repel the frigid cold of night!
spell.affectmessage: You are surrounded by a warm glow.

spell.name: chemical stability
spell.affectmessage: You feel chemically inert.

spell.name: clarifying harmonies
spell.lyrics: The magic uncovered as choruses sing, To answer the mysteries one's life can bring.

spell.name: clumsiness
spell.affectmessage: You are feeling quite clumsy!

spell.name: cogenic neural bridging
spell.affectmessage: Your neural pathways have been bridged.

spell.name: death knell
spell.affectmessage: You feel giddy from the absorption of a life.

spell.name: defense ditty
spell.affectmessage: Harmonic resonance protects you from deleterious effects.

spell.name: defensive posturing
spell.affectmessage: You are postured defensively.

spell.name: densify
spell.affectmessage: You are feeling incredibly dense.

spell.name: dermal hardening
spell.affectmessage: Your dermal surfaces are hardened.

spell.name: detect scrying
spell.affectmessage: You are sensitive to attempts to magical scrying.

spell.name: dimensional shift
spell.affectmessage: You are traversing a parallel dimension.

spell.name: dimensional void
spell.affectmessage: You are disoriented from your foray into the interdimensional void!

spell.name: divine intervention
spell.affectmessage: You are shielded by divine intervention.

spell.name: drifters ditty
spell.lyrics: The journey of a thousand miles begins with just one step, So I'll provide a merry tune to give our step some pep!
spell.affectmessage: A pleasant tune gives you a pep in your step.

spell.name: eagles overture
spell.affectmessage: Others are impressed by your beautiful voice.

spell.name: electrostatic field
spell.affectmessage: You are surrounded by an electrostatic field.

skill.name: elusion
skill.affectmessage: You are attempting to hide your tracks.

spell.name: endurance
spell.affectmessage: Your endurance is increased.

spell.name: entangle
spell.affectmessage: You are entangled in the undergrowth!

spell.name: entropy field
spell.affectmessage: You are caught up in an entropy field!

spell.name: fear
spell.affectmessage: The world is a terribly frightening place!

spell.name: fire breathing
spell.affectmessage: You are empowered with breath of FIRE!

spell.name: fortissimo
spell.description: an upbeat tune that swells to a deafening volume
spell.affectmessage: Your voice reverberates with vigor!

spell.name: gamma nerve
spell.affectmessage: You are empowered with breath of FROST!

spell.name: gamma ray
spell.affectmessage: You have been irradiated.

spell.name: gauss shield
spell.affectmessage: You feel somewhat protected from metal.

spell.name: guiharias glory
spell.lyrics: Guiharia's Glory, her essence so pure, Her spirit renews me, my heart can endure
spell.affectmessage: The power of deities is rushing through your veins.

spell.name: home sweet home
spell.lyrics: I'm on my way, just set me free, Home sweet home.

spell.name: insidious rhythm
spell.affectmessage: Your senses have been dulled by insidious melodies.

spell.name: instant audience
spell.lyrics: Come one come all to hear my tune, The likes of which you'll not hear again soon.

spell.name: intellect
spell.affectmessage: Your mental faculties are augmented.

spell.name: irresistable dance
spell.lyrics: They found the gold, they did the dance, As treasure seekers do. Their cheerful spirit lingers on, In me as well as you.
spell.affectmessage: Your feet are dancing out of your control!

skill.name: kata
skill.affectmessage: You feel focused from your kata.

spell.name: lattice hardening
spell.affectmessage: Your molecular lattice has been strengthened.

spell.name: lichs lyrics
spell.lyrics: Your life leaks, your soul drips, Run slowly down his fingertips. Into the palm and see him smile, the lich controls you all the while.

skill.name: lullaby
skill.lyrics: The sweet allure of pleasant dreams Is irresistable, so it seems. So have no fear, just close your eyes, And meditate on what you prize

spell.name: lustration melisma
spell.lyrics: The poison, the plague, the malady's cold, We beg for release from these sicknesses' hold.

spell.name: magical protection
spell.affectmessage: You are protected against magic.

spell.name: malefic violation
spell.affectmessage: You feel overwhelmingly wicked!

spell.name: mana shield
spell.affectmessage: You are protected by a mana shield.

spell.name: melee combat tactics
spell.affectmessage: Melee Combat Tactics are in effect.

spell.name: melody of mettle
spell.lyrics: Our courage has seen us through worse times before; Such mettle is forged in the fires of war!
spell.affectmessage: Your vitality is boosted by the Melody of Mettle.

spell.name: metabolism increase
spell.affectmessage: Your metabolism is racing.

spell.name: misdirection melisma
spell.lyrics: The hunter shall not see my face, The melody removes my trace.
spell.affectmessage: Your path is cloaked in the tendrils of song.

spell.name: motor spasm
spell.affectmessage: Your muscles are convulsing uncontrollably!

spell.name: nanite reconstruction
spell.affectmessage: Your implants are undergoing nanite reconstruction.

spell.name: offensive posturing
spell.affectmessage: You are postured offensively.

spell.name: petrify
spell.affectmessage: You are turning into &NSTONE&n!

spell.name: power
spell.affectmessage: Your physical strength is augmented.

spell.name: power overture
spell.lyrics: Such strength to rule without dispute, A surge of power absolute
spell.affectmessage: Your strength is bolstered by song.

spell.name: pray
spell.affectmessage: You feel guided by divine forces.

spell.name: psychic feedback
spell.affectmessage: You are providing psychic feedback to your attackers.

spell.name: psychic resistance
spell.affectmessage: Your mind is resistant to external energies.

skill.name: purple haze
skill.lyrics: Purple haze was in my eyes. Don't know if it's day or night. You've got me blowing, blowing my mind. Is it tomorrow or just the end of time?

spell.name: quad damage
spell.affectmessage: You are dealing out &cquad damage&n.

spell.name: reflex boost
spell.affectmessage: Your Reflex Boosters are active.

spell.name: regalers rhapsody
spell.lyrics: A morsel of a melody keeps appetites in line, For when the battle's finally won, we all will drink and dine!
spell.affectmessage: A tune has soothed your hunger and thirst.

spell.name: relaxation
spell.affectmessage: You feel very relaxed.

spell.name: repulsion field
spell.affectmessage: You are emitting a repulsion field.

spell.name: rhapsody of remedy
spell.lyrics: As blades can rend and magic freeze, A song can mend it all with ease.

spell.name: rhythm of alarm
spell.lyrics: The rogue may stalk, but I can see His presence is revealed to me.

spell.name: rhythm of rage
spell.affectmessage: You are consumed by a feral rage!

spell.name: righteous penetration
spell.affectmessage: You feel overwhelmingly righteous!

spell.name: sanctification
spell.affectmessage: You have been sanctified!

spell.name: shield of righteousness
spell.affectmessage: You are surrounded by a shield of righteousness.

spell.name: spirit track
spell.affectmessage: You can track by sensing the spirit of your prey.

spell.name: stigmata
spell.affectmessage: A bloody stigmatic mark is seared into your forehead.

spell.name: stoneskin
spell.affectmessage: Your skin is as hard as granite.

spell.name: strength
spell.affectmessage: Your physical strength is magically augmented.

spell.name: telekinesis
spell.affectmessage: You may use your mind to hold more things.

spell.name: telepathy
spell.affectmessage: Your telepathic abilities are greatly enhanced.

spell.name: thorn skin
spell.affectmessage: There are thorns protruding from your skin.

spell.name: unladen swallow song
spell.lyrics: The sky is the swallow's place to be in, whether African or European
spell.affectmessage: You are under the effect of an uplifting tune!

spell.name: unravelling diapason
spell.lyrics: Oh mystic forces, hear my yell, Unmake your magic, break this spell

spell.name: vacuum shroud
spell.affectmessage: You are existing in a total vacuum.

spell.name: verse of valor
spell.lyrics: The battle, still it rages, As it has for many ages, But a piercing strike can hope to end it all.
spell.affectmessage: The spirit of fallen heroes fills your being.

spell.name: verse of vulnerability
spell.lyrics: The music flows from me to you, It guides my blade as I strike true!
spell.affectmessage: You feel more vulnerable to attack.

spell.name: weakness
spell.affectmessage: You feel unusually weakened.

spell.name: weight of the world
spell.lyrics: We carry the weight of the world on our shoulders, Holding us down as surely as boulders. To lighten our loads, this song we'll sing, And to our packs a lightness bring!
spell.affectmessage: The weight of the world rests lightly upon your shoulders.

spell.name: word of intellect
spell.affectmessage: Your intellect is magically augmented.

spell.name: wounding whispers
spell.lyrics: The whispered lies and gossip told Come back to haunt the young and old. The barrier they form is very thin, But blocks true love and harbors sin.
spell.affectmessage: You are surrounded by whirling slivers of sound.

spell.name: zen of awareness
spell.affectmessage: The zen of motion is one with your body.

spell.name: zen of celerity
spell.affectmessage: You are under the effects of the zen of celerity.
